General.Name: SES AI Corp
General.Description: SES AI Corporation engages in the development and production of AI enhanced lithium metal and lithium ion rechargeable battery technologies for electric vehicles, urban air mobility, drones, robotics, battery energy storage systems, and other applications in the United States and the Asia Pacific region. It manufactures and sells li metal battery cells and battery materials, such as electrolytes for automotive original equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Woburn, Massachusetts.
General.Address: 35 Cabot Road, Woburn, MA, United States, 01801
